combobox.name: cbBuffHateGroupMember
combobox.Width:
100 20 The Group Member to Hate Buff
This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffHateGroupMember]}] This.ItemByValue[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffHateGroupMember]}]:Select
LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[BuffHateGroupMember,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},BuffHateGroupMember,0,1,0]

combobox.name: cbBuffHealGroupMember
combobox.Width:
100 20 The Group Member to Heal Buff
This:AddItem[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffCoerciveHealingGroupMember]}] This.ItemByValue[${LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}].FindSetting[BuffCoerciveHealingGroupMember]}]:Select
LavishSettings[EQ2Bot].FindSet[Character].FindSet[${Me.SubClass}]:AddSetting[BuffCoerciveHealingGroupMember,${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:Save_Settings
Script[EQ2Bot].VariableScope.EQ2Bot:RefreshList[${This.FullName},BuffCoerciveHealingGroupMember,0,1,0]
